name: Confederation Europeenne de Distilleries Vinicoles
headAddress: Boulevard de Waterloo, 30 c/o Grimaldi studio legale
membership: CEDIVI is composed by AssoDistil, the Italian Alcohol Association, ADEVIN the Spanish wine Alcohol Association and other single companies from Italy and France. Together they joints about 70 distilleries.
goal: CEDIVI represents almost 70% of wine alcohol distilleries in Europe. Its goal is to protect its producing members and to represent them before both national and international institutions.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Competition, Customs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
CAP Reform
CMO Reform
Implementing Regulations of Regulation no. 110/2008
TAXUD : demand for extra CN
DG AGRI : demand for traceability through EMCS/GAMMA documents ( DAE )
Anti-fraud measures
